solution_line_template: The fixer used {kitchen_percentage}*{initial_nails} = <<{kitchen_percentage}*{initial_nails}={nails_used_kitchen}>>{nails_used_kitchen} nails to fix the kitchen.

The number of nails remaining in the container after he fixes the kitchen is {initial_nails}-{nails_used_kitchen} = <<{initial_nails}-{nails_used_kitchen}={nails_remaining_after_kitchen}>>{nails_remaining_after_kitchen}

He also uses {fence_percentage}*{nails_remaining_after_kitchen} = <<{fence_percentage}*{nails_remaining_after_kitchen}={nails_used_fence}>>{nails_used_fence} of the nails remaining in the container to fix the fence.

The total number of nails which the fixer hasn't used is {nails_remaining_after_kitchen}-{nails_used_fence} = <<{nails_remaining_after_kitchen}-{nails_used_fence}={nails_remaining_total}>>{nails_remaining_total}
